original_title: Huang Fei-hong Shamian fu shen quan
overview: One in a series of films about the feats of Chinese folk hero, Wong Fei-hung. English title "How Huang Fei-hong Vanquished the Terrible Hound at Shamian" or "How Wong Fei-hung Vanquished the Ferocious Dog in Shamian".
title: How Huang Fei-hong Vanquished the Terrible Hound at Shamian
